conserve.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to protect something and prevent it from changing or being damaged
conserve.translation[0].definitions[0].e: We must conserve our woodlands for future generations.
conserve.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to use as little water, energy etc as possible so that it is not wasted
conserve.translation[1].definitions[0].d: fruit that is preserved by being cooked with sugar
